actions.text: On agreeing to the Brown (FL) amendment (A015) Agreed to by recorded vote: 216 - 207 (Roll no. 589).
Amendment (A015) offered by Ms. Brown (FL) to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A015) offered by Ms. Brown (FL) to the Rules amendment (A001).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Brown (FL) amendment (A015) Agreed to by recorded vote: 216 - 207 (Roll no. 589).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

amends_amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.

description: Amendment creates a National Advisory Committee on Travel and Tourism Infrastructure which will advise the Secretary of Transportation on infrastructure needs related to the use of the nation's intermodal transportation network to facilitate travel and tourism.
purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in Part B of House Report 114-325 to create a National Advisory Committee on Travel and Tourism Infrastructure which will advise the Secretary of Transportation on infrastructure needs related to the use of the nation's intermodal transportation network to facilitate travel and tourism.
